settings.editor:
Your sanctuary for deep relaxation and inner harmony.
Come back to yourself.
"We built this space not to escape life, but to find the strength to return to it."

settings.title:
Rest is a biological
necessity, not a luxury.

settings.editor: In a world that demands constant output, Stillness is an invitation to pause. Founded by Elena Corves after her own journey through burnout, our sanctuary is designed around the principles of sensory reduction and nervous system regulation.
Here, the water holds you so you don't have to hold yourself. We strip away the noise—gravity, light, sound, expectations—leaving only the spaciousness you need to exhale.
Beyond the water. A holistic ecosystem for your nervous system.
Zero-gravity sensory relief to decompress the spine and silence the mind.
Guided pranayama sessions to shift from fight-or-flight to rest-and-digest.
Vibrational therapy using crystal bowls to synchronize brainwave states.
Post-float journaling and tea rituals to anchor your calm before leaving.
Burnout is the silent killer of creativity. Our corporate programs are designed to reset your team's collective nervous system, fostering clarity, empathy, and sustainable productivity.

settings.html: <style>#teaser_section { position: relative; overflow: hidden; } #teaser_section::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 25%; width: 384px; height: 384px; background: #1D3152; border-radius: 50%; filter: blur(128px); opacity: 0.4; animation: pulse 8s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.6, 1) infinite; z-index: 0; pointer-events: none; } #teaser_section::after { content: ''; position: absolute; bottom: 0; right: 25%; width: 500px; height: 500px; background: #688F9D; border-radius: 50%; filter: blur(150px); opacity: 0.2; animation: pulse 8s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.6, 1) infinite; animation-delay: 4s; z-index: 0; pointer-events: none; } @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { opacity: 0.4; transform: scale(1); } 50% { opacity: 0.6; transform: scale(1.1); } } #teaser_form_box { backdrop-filter: blur(12px) !important; -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px) !important; z-index: 10; position: relative; border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05) !important; } .teaser-btn { width: 100% !important; display: inline-flex !important; align-items: center !important; justify-content: center !important; padding: 12px 32px !important; background-color: #0e1b31 !important; color: #F7F0EC !important; border: none !important; border-radius: 9999px !important; cursor: pointer !important; margin-top: 8px !important; font-family: "Lato", sans-serif !important; font-size: 14px !important; line-height: 20px !important; text-transform: uppercase !important; letter-spacing: 0.05em !important; transition: all 0.7s ease-out !important; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06) !important; } .teaser-btn:hover { background-color: #688F9D !important; transform: scale(1.05) !important; box-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05) !important; }</style>
